name: Microwave Oven Toshiba MM-EM23P(BK)-CV Black
origAbout: The ultimate microwave with a grill functions that will fulfill the happiness in your kitchen. Easy-to-use Grill Function. 2 Combo Functions - Heating the food by using microwave energy and by mainly using heater. Express Cook - Easy-to-use, quickly warm your food, with just one touch. Optional use for each type of food. You can up to 11 levels (0% -100%). LED display and precise time setting. Precise digital system. 6 Automatic Program - Popcorn, potatoes, frozen pizzas, warming beverage, defrost frozen vegetables and frozen meat.
